Component Showcase

File Trees

File trees can include highlights, placeholders, and comments

  • Directorydata/
    • Directorysource/ any source data we need to directly track
      • …
    • Directoryderived/ derived data we create
      • …
  • Directoryscripts/
    • _deps.R include baseline dependencies for renv
  • renv.lock highlight renv
  • …

Steps

  1. restore the project to install the baseline packages:

  2. install any additional packages you want

Tip

You need both indentation and an extra space for any code/other text below the ordered list to keep the parser happy. Just an indent will not work.

  • cli
